divs: sighting detailsdriving dont morrison drive heading north. noticing a triangular object hoveringin the sky from the corner of my eye. we stop to study the object and drive toan open area of the street. the object had 3 lights on the back, 1 on the frontand a red one in the middle. the object then begins to move at high speeds as webegin driving to wal-mart seeming as if it is following us. then fades into thedistance. sky was clear at all times. i first noticed the object when erinpointed it out. i thought the object was a difflicted\deformed plane until irealized it was something inexplainable. i was freaked, shocked, interested,freaked, psyched, and freaked once more. the object was hovering and moving athigh speeds. it faded away into the distance.
trends: There have been 6 other sightings in Clinton
There was one other sighting in Clinton on or around July 12th 2002
Summary: Triangular object seen flying in the urban area.
